title: Muse: A Dreamlands Novel
description: A new muse arrives in the Dreamlands with three a magic Book, a supernaturally keen sense of smell, and the instinct to find a story worth writing.Mina is a brand-new muse, but sheâ€™s already in trouble with the faerie courts, the werewolves, and her mentor, Max. Together, she and her strange new allies must restore balance to the Court of Seasons before Equinox, or face the wrath of the powerful faerie queen.
author: Katherine Jean Pope
